instructions_to_main_agent: Install dependencies: `npm install lucide-react framer-motion clsx tailwind-merge recharts date-fns` (or yarn add)
Update `tailwind.config.js` with the provided color palette and fonts.
Import the Google Fonts in `index.css` or `index.html`.
Apply `bg-[#F9F8F6]` (Stone-50 equivalent) to the body tag to kill the stark white.
Use 'Tenor Sans' for all H1, H2, H3 headings. Use 'Manrope' for body text and UI elements.
For the Therapist Mobile View: Use a bottom navigation bar or a clean drawer. Buttons must be at least 48px height for touch targets.
For Admin Dashboard: Use the 'Bento Grid' layout. Avoid standard tables where possible; use 'Card Lists' or specialized data views.
Charts: Use `recharts`. Style them with the custom palette: Gold (#B89D62) for revenue, Sage (#88856A) for completed targets, Terracotta (#C76B6B) for missed targets.
Login Page: Use a split layout with the luxury interior image on one side (or top on mobile) and the form on the other.
Use 'Sonner' for toasts, styled with the 'glassmorphism' class.
CRITICAL: Do not use default blue colors. Replace all default blues with the Primary Gold or Muted Sage.
UNIVERSAL_GUIDELINES: Avoid generic 'AI slop' aesthetics; no default shadows or standard Tailwind blues.
Micro-animations are mandatory for every interaction (hover, click, focus).
Use z-index hierarchy to create depth (shadows + blur).
Never use generic emojis as icons.
